I have DIVX codec, KLITE Mega 2.0 codec, CCPSP, CCPSP2, and Xvid codecs so if you dont have them, that might be why the video and audio are not in sync for you. The divx and klite codecs are free. I hope this helps.

"I have DIVX codec, KLITE Mega 2.0 codec, CCPSP, CCPSP2, and Xvid codecs so if you dont have them, that might be why the video and audio are not in sync for you. The divx and klite codecs are free. I hope this helps."
This is a dvd, it doesn't have anything to do with the codecs you mentioned.
It just takes a software or hardware dvd player to watch.
One might wonder why the author of the conversion doesn't know such an obvious thing.
